Topic.Title: Playing soundtrack and sound effects simultaneously?

Posts.EditableText: Is playing soundtrack and sound effects simultaneously possible? I keep finding myself in a situation where my soundtrack is being interrupted by a couple of sound effects I am trying to implement. If this is possible, can someone please explain how?
Posts.HTML: Is playing soundtrack and sound effects simultaneously possible? I keep finding myself in a situation where my soundtrack is being interrupted by a couple of sound effects I am trying to implement. If this is possible, can someone please explain how?

Posts.EditableText: Yes this has been solved by using quest for the soundtrack/background and getting foreground samples using html5. Look at the end of this thread: viewtopic.php?f=3&t=4632
Posts.HTML:
Yes this has been solved by using quest for the soundtrack/background and getting foreground samples using html5.

Look at the end of this thread:
